created_by: Florian Roth, Markus Neis, Jonhnathan Ribeiro, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, oscd.community
name: Chafer Activity
description: Detects Chafer activity attributed to OilRig as reported in Nyotron report in March 2018
query: (winlog.channel:System AND winlog.provider_name:/[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee]\ [Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll]\ [Mm][Aa][Nn][Aa][Gg][Ee][Rr]/ AND event.code:7045 AND winlog.event_data.ServiceName:(/[Ss][Cc]\ [Ss][Cc][Hh][Ee][Dd][Uu][Ll][Ee][Dd]\ [Ss][Cc][Aa][Nn]/ OR /[Uu][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Mm][Aa][Cc][Hh][Ii][Nn][Ee]/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:System AND winlog.provider_name:Service\ Control\ Manager AND event.code:7045 AND winlog.event_data.ServiceName:(SC\ Scheduled\ Scan OR UpdatMachine))`
